messages.message: does anyone have a good way I can explain to customers why we create both an `.ibdoc` file and an `.ibocr` file when we run a Flow? and how they should differentiate between the two of them?

specifically i’m trying to build a training on confidence tracking, and i’m trying to explain how to open up the actual `.ibocr` file and look at the confidence scores, but don’t know how to explain the doubling of files

im pretty sure we only create a `.ibdoc` or an `.ibocr`  file. Are you running without "Output has run id" option checked true? If not, you might be seeing both because one is from a previous flow run output?
This can also be sovled by checking "Delete Previous Output" under Extra Settings
